Hero.subtitle: Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ)
Hero.description: “THE BEST OF YOU ARE THOSE WHO ARE BEST TO THEIR WOMEN”

About.title: About the Movie
About.description: Several stories of violence against women, based on true events, are intricately interwoven and unfold against the backdrop of traditional society in modern Kyrgyzstan, ultimately leading to a series of tragic incidents.

film_stills.title: Film Stills
film_stills.query: We are here to make your dream come true, no matter how crazy. Whatever you want, we can create it to fulfill your dream home.
